title: Unresponsive issue
body:
Hi. I have this problem for about 2weeks so far.

My champ is unresponsive often when I click so many times of my mouse.

It doesn't move, and my internet and chat everything else is completely fine.

I have seen some discussion in Reddit and here, some people have same problem and Riot still not figured out.
The discussions were about 2years ago and it still happens, what is that..

I am using mac pro btw. Please fix it or let me know some ways to fix it.

It absolutely makes me unplayable.

P.S. I think it should be a part of packet loss, but it's not the exactly same since my minions and other players seem work very well and smoothly. Also, I can see my mouse cursor that I intended to move, but just my champ didn't move at all occasionally.

Any ideas?

replies.body:
This certainly does sound a lot like [*Packet Loss*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Packet_loss), which happens when some of the data packets your computer sends to the servers are lost along the way. I'd strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as to ensure your local network settings are up to spec.

Let me know the results of those steps.

I have no idea what MTR is and I cannot find the file to download. The article shows that the file is attached in the article, but I don't see any. Can you attach one here, so I can download that and try out?
I'm not sure what you mean. Can you let me know how the steps went for you and if you noticed any change?
